title: Quantum Counting IQAE
subtitle: Counting Solutions to equation using Iterative Quantum Amplitude Estimation
description: Implementation of quantum counting via the Iterative Quantum Amplitude Estimation (IQAE) algorithm, which estimates the number of solutions to a search problem without using QPE, reducing qubit and gate count. The example counts solutions to a simple arithmetic constraint using Classiq's grover_operator and amplitude-estimation flow.
